泒泒泒

泒字的基本解释

泒
gū
〔泒水〕古河名，源出中国山西省，流至天津入海。

泒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gū］
［《龍龕手鑒》普賣切］
［《廣韻》古胡切，平模，見。］
古水名。发源于今山西省繁峙县南，为滹沱河之源。
[②]［pài］
“派1”的讹字。
(1)支流。
(2)分支；派别。
(3)派遣。

泒字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泒； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页616第08
【唐韻】古胡切【集韻】攻乎切，?音孤。水名。【說文】水起雁門葰人戍夫山，東北入海。【水經】沽水至泉州縣與淸河合，東入于海。淸河者，泒河尾也。【註】淸湛漳洹?易淶濡沽虖沱，同歸於海，故曰泒河尾。　俗混入派字，非。【佩觿集】以水名之泒。爲宗派者，訛。

泒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泒字的起名意思

暂无。

Luo
Basic explanation of words
Luo
gū
[Lanshui] The name of the ancient river originated from Shanxi Province, China, and flowed to Tianjin into the sea.
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gū］
["The Handbook of the Dragon's Niche" is generally sold and cut]
["Guang Yun" Gu Hu cut, flat model, see you. ]
Ancient water name. It originated in the south of Fanzhi County, Shanxi Province, and is the source of the Hutuo River.
[②]［pài］
The corruption of "Pai 1".
(1) Tributary.
(2) Branch; faction.
(3) Dispatch.
Luo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泒; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 616 08
[Tang Yun] Gu Huqie [Ji Yun] attacking almost cutting,? The sound is lonely. Water name. [Said the text] The water rises from Yanmenjingren Shufu Mountain and enters the sea from the northeast. 【Shui Jing】Go to Quanzhou County and merge with the Cheonghe River, and enter the sea in the east. Those who are in Cheonghe are also at the end of Luhe. [Note] Cheung Zhan Zhang Huan? Yi Lai Nai Gu Fu Tuo, both belong to the sea, so it is called the end of the river.　Vulgar mixed into pie characters, not. 【Pei Gou Ji】It's a lotus in the name of water. For sectarians, false.
